void ldmx::BiasingMessenger::SetNewValue ( G4UIcommand *  command,
G4String  newValues 
)

Definition at line 43 of file BiasingMessenger.cxx.

References biasingEnabled_, particleType_, process_, threshold_, volume_, and xsecTrans_.

                                                                               { 

        if (command == enableBiasingCmd_) biasingEnabled_ = true; 
        else if (command == particleTypeCmd_) particleType_ = newValues;  
        else if (command == processCmd_) process_ = newValues;
        else if (command == thresholdCmd_)threshold_ = G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues);
        else if (command == volumeCmd_) volume_ = newValues;
        else if (command == xsecTransCmd_) xsecTrans_ = G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValues);
    }

Member Data Documentation

bool ldmx::BiasingMessenger::biasingEnabled_ [static, private]

Directory containing all biasing commands. Command enabling biasing. Command allowing a user to specify what particle type to bias. Command allowing a user to specify what process to bias. Command allowing a user to specify an energy threshold. Command allowing a user to specify what volume the biasing should be attached to. Command allowing a user to specify by what factor the xsec of the process will be increased. Flag indicating if biasing is enabled
